column1: Congratulations to my colleague @JudgeJohnCarter on his decisive victory in #TX31! https://t.co/KRtff14O5Z
Congratulations to my colleague @VanTaylorTX on his decisive victory in #TX03! https://t.co/EWAqc6KCiY
Congratulations to my colleague @McCaulforTexas on his decisive win in #TX10. We’ve served together for over a decade and I look forward to continuing our work. https://t.co/v3PpjNXxwr

Congratulations to my colleague @ChipRoyTX on his win in #TX21. Chip won decisively despite Democrats across the country going all-in to defeat him. I look forward to continuing to serve together! https://t.co/2tXXvXS4FZ
Congratulations to Congressman-elect @AugustPfluger on his win in #TX11. I’m looking forward to working together next year and delivering for Texans! https://t.co/1iVvJT0Gfq

Congratulations to Congressman-elect @SheriffTNehls on his win in #TX22. Troy faced significant out-of-state liberal spending in this toss-up seat but fought to win handily and keep this seat in Republican hands. https://t.co/gdeF4VVdIx

Congratulations to Congressman-elect @TonyGonzales4TX on his win in #TX23. Democrats thought they could easily win this seat but Tony fought each and everyday to show voters why he should be their voice in Washington. https://t.co/dtxj7b9Y8w

Congratulations to Congresswoman-elect @bethvanduyne on her win in #TX24. Beth defied predictions and millions in out-of-state liberal spending to keep this seat in Republican hands.   I look forward to serving together next year! https://t.co/BgT6giFoHN
Thank you to the voters of #TX26 for once again trusting me to be your voice in Washington. It's an honor and a privilege. https://t.co/MdVQ6bvixJ

Texans have incredible Republicans running for Congress on the ballot today.   Best of luck to @Bethvanduyne @WesleyHuntTX @TonyGonzales4TX @SheriffTNehls @AugustPfluger and @gcforcongress.   I hope I have the pleasure of serving with these fantastic individuals next year.

I've had the great pleasure of serving alongside @chiproytx @McCaulforTexas @VanTaylorTX and @JudgeJohnCarter in Congress.   They are relentless advocates for Texas and I look forward to working with them to deliver for our great state for years to come.

Good luck to @realDonaldTrump and Republicans across the country.   It's vital that we re-elect President Trump protect the GOP Senate Majority and retake the House from Pelosi.  If you haven't already get out to vote today. Find your polling place ⤵️ https://t.co/NMMxFkdqeL

It was great to join @JohnCornyn's 'Get Out The Vote' bus tour today in Fort Worth.   Sen. Cornyn needs our support on Election Day to Keep Texas Red and protect @realDonaldTrump's Senate majority.   Find out where you can vote on Tuesday ⤵️ https://t.co/NMMxFkdqeL https://t.co/EIYMHR0T8n

State Rep. @tparker63 hits the nail on the head.   If you value the future of Texas' economy and our leading role in achieving energy independence then @realDonaldTrump is the only choice this election.   Read more ⤵️ https://t.co/3LxP7tpmlT

Today is the FINAL DAY to vote early in Texas!   Turnout in Texas has shattered records. We need Republicans to get out and vote!   Don't know when or where to vote? Learn more 👇 https://t.co/NMMxFkdqeL

There are still 3 days left to vote early in Texas!  @realDonaldTrump @TeamCornyn and Republicans up and down the ballot need you to turn out.   Find our everything you need to know 👇 https://t.co/TjCVnSTlKn

With 8 days left we have to ensure Republicans in tight races across the country have the resources to win and help us #TakeBackTheHouse.   That's why I'm asking you to join me in supporting @GoodForCongress by chipping in right now 👇 https://t.co/uzVErJNgjR https://t.co/rc0bTJcqRI
Texans will remember. https://t.co/IYUIiiodd7

Judge Amy Coney Barrett was brilliant through over 20 hours of questioning.   Judge Barrett showed the American people that she has the qualifications and judicial temperament to serve on the Supreme Court. https://t.co/SnqvOLuTZc

.@realDonaldTrump is going to do extremely well here in Texas and we're working tirelessly on the ground to turn out the president's supporters.   If you don't already have a plan to vote get all the info you need here: https://t.co/NMMxFkdqeL https://t.co/jGAO6oE8u4
Beto O'Rourke claims Texas is "Biden's to lose."   Well there's a reason we don't have a Senator Beto today.  On the ground it's clear that Texas is @realDonaldTrump Country. https://t.co/iDXCaNu9kn
Wishing @realDonaldTrump and the First Lady a speedy recovery. https://t.co/AY9fSIhJxY

I've never seen a response like @realDonaldTrump's Admin has mounted in the fight against #COVID19.   #OperationWarpSpeed has been an incredible effort and Americans should feel confident in the safety and availability of a vaccine in the coming months.  Watch my take 👇 https://t.co/dkVpQhmq0L

Congratulations to Judge Amy Coney Barett on her nomination to the Supreme Court by @realdonaldtrump.   Judge Coney Barrett is an incredible jurist who will deliver decisions based on the rule of law and the Constitution.   I look forward to her confirmation by the U.S. Senate. https://t.co/IHw54L9LaR
